main event: A civilian reported observing an unidentified flying object over Buffalo, New York on July 12, 1967.
interesting points: The observer claimed the object was cylindrical, illuminated from within, and metallic in appearance., The object hovered motionless initially, then accelerated in a horizontal direction while making a 90-degree turn., The sighting lasted approximately 10-15 seconds, with no sound or visible trail., The object was estimated to be between 1,000 and 2,000 feet in altitude and was compared to the brightness of the full moon., The observer was familiar with UFO classifications but noted that this sighting did not fit any typical descriptions.
witness description: A 35-year-old male who was interested in flying saucers and familiar with general descriptions of UFOs.
